answerText: Dandelion Wine[10] In this best-known Bradbury novel, Guy Montag lives in a dystopian society where reading is outlawed.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Maryland B + Loyola  | 20 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One character in this novel builds a Happiness Machine. For 10 points each: [10] Name this semiautobiographical novel by Ray Bradbury which follows the summer of Douglas Spaulding in Green Town, Illinois.
